name: Gameboy Crossing
description:
Created by kazamor and dihan in our second-ever game jam submission! 

Play as a villager in this Demake adaptation of Animal Crossing (2001). Use your fishing rod, net, and shovel to complete a list of chores for Tom Nook. Good luck! 

Controls: 

Press Space to start

Move Left/Right/Up/Down

  • A (left)
  • D (right)
  • W (up) 
  • S (down)
  • left arrow key
  • right arrow key
  • up arrow key
  • down arrow key 

Switch Tools 

  • ‘E’

Use Tools 

  • Spacebar [-]
